positions.subtitle: Videobeat Networks
positions.description: Videobeat Networks is the specialist for cross-platform video marketing. Based on the knowledge gained from numerous YouTube, Facebook video, RTB and TV campaigns we support leading companies to fulfill their marketing goals on the worldâ€™s biggest video platforms. Our customers benefit from our proprietary marketing software, as well as numerous proven best practices. This results in more views, increased user interaction and higher viewer retention. Videobeat Networks has their headquarters located in Hamburg, with offices in London, Paris and New York.Get in touch: eleonora@videobeat.nethttp://www.videobeat.net/

projects.title: Santarcangelo dei Teatri Communication Project
projects.description: Communication analysis and plan for Santarcangelo dei Teatri, an international performing arts festival. The project analyses the festival's communication structure, looking for potential ways to attract new audience segments and improve the effectiveness of online tools.

projects.title: Capital Campaign for Franco Parenti Theatre
projects.description: Capital Campaign project for an Italian contemporary theatre institution in Milan. The project develops a one-year plan to meet the fundraising needs of the institution. It is based on fundraising models while exploring innovative solutions to appeal to potential donors.For a copy, please contact the authors.
